name: BNNSPointerSpecifier
desc: Constants that specify which pointer the BNNS get filter function returns.

items.name: var BNNSPointerSpecifierAlpha: BNNSPointerSpecifier
items.desc: A constant that specifies the alpha pointer.

items.name: var BNNSPointerSpecifierBeta: BNNSPointerSpecifier
items.desc: A constant that specifies the beta pointer.
